# Ismin 3A Android Project
Bicheler Hugo & Dall'Agnol Eric

## Table of Contents

- [Context](#context)
- [API](#api)
- [Android](#android)







-------

## Context

This application was developed as part of ISMIN Android courses.

The main goal is to display data on an Android App using our own API.

This project shows the top 20 most populated Towns in these countries : 
- France, 
- UK, 
- Spain, 
- Switzerland, 
- Belgium, 
- Germany
- Italy


***NOTE : Data have been refactored but come from this [database](https://data.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/worldcitiespop%40public/table/?disjunctive.country&timezone=Europe%2FBerlin&sort=population&%3D%3D)
